name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur is a seed Pokémon. It is known for its ability to photosynthesize.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander is a lizard Pokémon. It can breathe fire and is very affectionate.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a turtle Pokémon. It is known for its powerful water attacks.

name: Pidgey
description: Pidgey is a small bird Pokémon. It is known for its strong wings.

name: Rattata
description: Rattata is a purple rodent Pokémon. It is known for its sharp teeth.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff is a balloon Pokémon. It sings to put others to sleep.

name: Zubat
description: Zubat is a bat Pokémon. It uses echolocation to navigate in the dark.

name: Psyduck
description: Psyduck is a duck Pokémon. It suffers from constant headaches.
